body: {"sentence":[{"text":"They were on a beach, but it was very different from most beaches.","bid":"TPSRI35","page":5,"audio":[{"pronunciation":"US","url":"https://s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/tapas-meta-contents/audios/TPSNR06_pigpen.mp3"},{"pronunciation":"UK","url":"https://s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/tapas-meta-contents/audios/TPSNR06_pigpen.mp3"}]}]}
